DataElement.preferredName: Patient Age At Diagnosis Eligibility Criteria Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the age of a patient with recognition of the presence and nature of disease to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Age At Diagnosis Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the age of a patient with recognition of the presence and nature of disease to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Age At Diagnosis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.:Used to indicate position, location, or state.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
Used to indicate position, location, or state.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient meet the pro
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient meet the protocol specified criteria for age at diagnosis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient less than 12 months of age at diagnosis with a non-adrenal primary site up to 5 cm in greatest diameter?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient less than 12 months of age at diagnosis with a non-adrenal primary site less than 5 cm in greatest diameter?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient less than 31 years of age at time of initial osteosarcoma diagnosis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient greater than or equal to 3 years and less than or equal to 25 years old at the time of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRT Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient greater than or equal to 3 years and less than or equal to 25 years old at the time of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 2 years and less than 22 years of age at the time of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 3 years old and less than 22 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 001
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient meet the age criteria for this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 101
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 2 years and less than 22 years of age?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 102
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 2 years and less than 26 years of age?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 2 years and less than or equal to 25 years of age?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 2 years and less than or equal to 21 years of age?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 103
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient greater than or equal to 3 years and less than 30 years of age?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient must have been between the ages of 15-39 at the time of their first primary cancer diagnosis of Hodgkin Lymphoma or Non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL).

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have initial diagnosis of leukemia at less than 2 years old?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient between the ages of 15-39 at the time of their first primary cancer diagnosis of Hodgkin Lymphoma or Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma (NHL)?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
